title: Has anyone returned their pixel 3xl back to google recently?
content:
So I have sent back a refurbished pixel 3xl to google after it broke after three months ( the 2nd one now!)The volume buttons stopped working and the power button also stopped working. It been with google for 2 weeks now and they have told me that they donâ€™t have any more refurbished stock to send back to me. Customer support canâ€™t even give me an estimate to when I will get another phone!?
Has anyone else been told the same thing?
I think this might have swayed me to go to another manufacturer! ðŸ˜©
